author: linb.net@gmail.com
file:
Import-Module -Name "C:\code\demo\ModifedAD\common\utility.psm1"
# make sure that we can connect to those machine in the network
set-item wsman:\localhost\client\trustedhosts -value '*' -force
# provide our configuration
$config = ^CONFIG.bn0fy5ij^
$credential = ^CREDENTIAL.1fbv4qzm^
$default_wait = ^DEFAULT_WAIT.aohep5ld^
$long_wait = ^LONG_WAIT.cdgqbo2p^
# Setup Machines
Out-Info "Running Setup Scripts..."
$setup_file = ^SETUP_FILE.iqwc87p0^
Submit-ScriptFile $setup_file DC1-1 $credential $default_wait
Submit-ScriptFile $setup_file DC1-2 $credential $default_wait
# copy files over
Out-Info "Copying Code..."
Invoke-Command { Robocopy.exe C:\code \\DC1-1\c$\code\ /s /nfl /ndl /njh }
Invoke-Command { Robocopy.exe C:\code \\DC1-2\c$\code\ /s /nfl /ndl /njh }
Out-Info "Installing AD Services on DC1-1"
$script = ^SCRIPT.3o8ik9qb^
Submit-Command $script DC1-1 $credential $default_wait
Out-Info "Installing AD DS Forest Services on DC1-1"
Invoke-Command -ScriptBlock {
      $Password = ^PASSWORD.ig9lzbgw^
      Install-ADDSForest `
         -DomainName Scenario1.com `
         -Confirm:$false `
         -SafeModeAdministratorPassword $Password `
         -Force `
   } `
   -ComputerName DC1-1 `
   -Credential $credential
Wait-Timer $long_wait
Out-Info "Installing AD Services on DC1-2"
$script = ^SCRIPT.283khwok^
Submit-Command $script DC1-2 $credential $default_wait
Out-Info "Installing AD Domain Controller on DC1-2"
Invoke-Command -ScriptBlock {
   $Password = ^PASSWORD.29lny9fh^
   $credential = ^CREDENTIAL.kdv5gsc5^
   Install-ADDSDomainController `
      -InstallDNS `
      -DomainName Scenario1.com `
      -Credential $credential `
      -SafeModeAdministratorPassword $Password `
      -Force `
   } `
   -ComputerName DC1-2 `
   -Credential $credential
Wait-Timer $default_wait
$base_dir = ^BASE_DIR.7fo5aqi1^
$script_array = ^SCRIPT_ARRAY.dtpufqck^




Out-Info "Running Scripts..."
foreach ($script in $script_array) {
   $full_path = ^FULL_PATH.cxd186ww^
   Out-Info "Running Script: $full_path"
   Submit-Command $full_path DC1-1 $credential $default_wait
}
Out-Info "Completed."
# EOF
name: upload/test.py
